verses.verse: And it came to pass in the eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240> year <WH8141>, in the first <WH259> day of the month <WH2320>, that the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, because that Tyrus <WH6865> hath said <WH559> <WH8804> against Yerushalayim <WH3389>, Aha <WH1889>, she is broken <WH7665> <WH8738> that was the gates <WH1817> of the people <WH5971>: she is turned <WH5437> <WH8738> unto me: I shall be replenished <WH4390> <WH8735>, now she is laid waste <WH2717> <WH8717>:

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I am against thee, O Tyrus <WH6865>, and will cause many <WH7227> nations <WH1471> to come up <WH5927> <WH8689> against thee, as the sea <WH3220> causeht his waves <WH1530> to come up <WH5927> <WH8687>.

And they shall destroy <WH7843> <WH8765> the walls <WH2346> of Tyrus <WH6865>, and break down <WH2040> <WH8804> her towers <WH4026>: I will also scrape <WH5500> <WH8765> her dust <WH6083> from her, and make <WH5414> <WH8804> her like the top <WH6706> of a rock <WH5553>.

It shall be a place for the spreading <WH4894> of nets <WH2764> in the midst <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220>: for I have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>: and it shall become a spoil <WH957> to the nations <WH1471>.
And her daughters <WH1323> which are in the field <WH7704> shall be slain <WH2026> <WH8735> by the sword <WH2719>; and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.

For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I will bring <WH935> <WH8688> upon Tyrus <WH6865> Nebuchadrezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, a king <WH4428> of kings <WH4428>, from the north <WH6828>, with horses <WH5483>, and with chariots <WH7393>, and with horsemen <WH6571>, and companies <WH6951>, and much <WH7227> people <WH5971>.

He shall slay <WH2026> <WH8799> with the sword <WH2719> thy daughters <WH1323> in the field <WH7704>: and he shall make <WH5414> <WH8804> a fort <WH1785> against thee, and cast <WH8210> <WH8804> a mount <WH5550> against thee, and lift up <WH6965> <WH8689> the buckler <WH6793> against thee.
And he shall set <WH5414> <WH8799> engines <WH4239> of war <WH6904> against thy walls <WH2346>, and with his axes <WH2719> he shall break down <WH5422> <WH8799> thy towers <WH4026>.

By reason of the abundance <WH8229> of his horses <WH5483> their dust <WH80> shall cover <WH3680> <WH8762> thee: thy walls <WH2346> shall shake <WH7493> <WH8799> at the noise <WH6963> of the horsemen <WH6571>, and of the wheels <WH1534>, and of the chariots <WH7393>, when he shall enter <WH935> <WH8800> into thy gates <WH8179>, as men enter <WH3996> into a city <WH5892> wherein is made a breach <WH1234> <WH8794>.

With the hoofs <WH6541> of his horses <WH5483> shall he tread down <WH7429> <WH8799> all thy streets <WH2351>: he shall slay <WH2026> <WH8799> thy people <WH5971> by the sword <WH2719>, and thy strong <WH5797> garrisons <WH4676> shall go down <WH3381> <WH8799> to the ground <WH776>.

And they shall make a spoil <WH7997> <WH8804> of thy riches <WH2428>, and make a prey <WH962> <WH8804> of thy merchandise <WH7404>: and they shall break down <WH2040> <WH8804> thy walls <WH2346>, and destroy <WH5422> <WH8799> thy pleasant <WH2532> houses <WH1004>: and they shall lay <WH7760> <WH8799> thy stones <WH68> and thy timber <WH6086> and thy dust <WH6083> in the midst <WH8432> of the water <WH4325>.
And I will cause the noise <WH1995> of thy songs <WH7892> to cease <WH7673> <WH8689>; and the sound <WH6963> of thy harps <WH3658> shall be no more heard <WH8085> <WH8735>.

And I will make <WH5414> <WH8804> thee like the top <WH6706> of a rock <WH5553>: thou shalt be a place to spread <WH4894> nets <WH2764> upon <WH4894>; thou shalt be built <WH1129> <WH8735> no more: for I the YY <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> to Tyrus <WH6865>; Shall not the isles <WH339> shake <WH7493> <WH8799> at the sound <WH6963> of thy fall <WH4658>, when the wounded <WH2491> cry <WH602> <WH8800>, when the slaughter <WH2027> is made <WH2026> <WH8736> in the midst <WH8432> of thee?

Then all the princes <WH5387> of the sea <WH3220> shall come down <WH3381> <WH8804> from their thrones <WH3678>, and lay away <WH5493> <WH8689> their robes <WH4598>, and put off <WH6584> <WH8799> their broidered <WH7553> garments <WH899>: they shall clothe <WH3847> <WH8799> themselves with trembling <WH2731>; they shall sit <WH3427> <WH8799> upon the ground <WH776>, and shall tremble <WH2729> <WH8804> at every moment <WH7281>, and be astonished <WH8074> <WH8804> at thee.

And they shall take up <WH5375> <WH8804> a lamentation <WH7015> for thee, and say <WH559> <WH8804> to thee, How art thou destroyed <WH6> <WH8804>, that wast inhabited <WH3427> <WH8737> of seafaring men <WH3220>, the renowned <WH1984> <WH8794> city <WH5892>, which wast strong <WH2389> in the sea <WH3220>, she and her inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802>, which cause <WH5414> <WH8804> their terror <WH2851> to be on all that haunt <WH3427> <WH8802> it!

Now shall the isles <WH339> tremble <WH2729> <WH8799> in the day <WH3117> of thy fall <WH4658>; yea, the isles <WH339> that are in the sea <WH3220> shall be troubled <WH926> <WH8738> at thy departure <WH3318> <WH8800>.

For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; When I shall make <WH5414> <WH8800> thee a desolate <WH2717> <WH8737> city <WH5892>, like the cities <WH5892> that are not inhabited <WH3427> <WH8738>; when I shall bring up <WH5927> <WH8687> the deep <WH8415> upon thee, and great <WH7227> waters <WH4325> shall cover <WH3680> <WH8765> thee;

When I shall bring thee down <WH3381> <WH8689> with them that descend <WH3381> <WH8802> into the pit <WH953>, with the people <WH5971> of old time <WH5769>, and shall set <WH3427> <WH8689> thee in the low parts <WH8482> of the earth <WH776>, in places desolate <WH2723> of old <WH5769>, with them that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> to the pit <WH953>, that thou be not inhabited <WH3427> <WH8799>; and I shall set <WH5414> <WH8804> glory <WH6643> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>;

I will make <WH5414> <WH8799> thee a terror <WH1091>, and thou shalt be no more: though thou be sought for <WH1245> <WH8792>, yet shalt thou never <WH5769> be found <WH4672> <WH8735> again, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
